ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ को कारणले के तपाईंं आफु बस्दै आएको ठाउँ परिवर्तन गर्नुपर्यो?
ques_en: Due to COVID-19, did you have to migrate to a different location?
highlights: More than 55% had to relocate

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ ले ल्याएको आर्थिक मन्दीका कारणले गर्दा के तपाईंंले निम्न मध्ये कुनै भोग्नुपर्यो?
ques_en: Did you experience any of the following due to the economic downturn brought about by covid-19?
highlights: More than 80% lost job

ques_ne: के तपाईंं अझै पर्यटन क्षेत्रमै काम गर्दै हुनुहुन्छ ?
ques_en: Are you still working in the tourism sector?
highlights: More than 70% left unemployed

ques_ne: सन् २०१९ को तुलनामा सन् २०२० मा तपाईंंको कुल आय कसरी परिवर्तन भयो?
ques_en: How did your total income change in 2020 compared to 2019?
highlights: More than 80% has total income almost zero

ques_ne: पछिल्लो पल्ट आफ्नो पूर्ण तलब (वा आम्दानी) पाउनुभएको कति भयो?
ques_en: When was the last time you received your full salary (or full income)?
highlights: 82% received full salary for the last time before March 2020(i.e. Before 1st COVID-19 lockdown)

ques_ne: सन् २०१९ को तुलनामा तपाईंँको बचत अहिले कति बाँकी रहेको छ ?
ques_en: Compared to the end of 2019, how much savings do you have now?
highlights: Savings reduced to less than 25% for more than 90% of respondents

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ भन्दा पछी तपाईंँको आयमा तपाईंँ लगायत कति जना परिवार सदस्यहरू निर्भर छन् ?
ques_en: How many family members, including yourself, depend on your income after Covid-19?
highlights: Most of them have more than 3 people to look after, but...

ques_ne: तपाईंँको हालको आय कति जना परिवार सदस्यको आधारभूत आवश्यकता पूर्ति गर्न पर्याप्त छ ?
ques_en: How many of your family members’ basic needs can be met by your current income?
highlights: ... income is not even sufficient for themselves

ques_ne: के तपाईंँको कुनै ऋण तिर्न बाँकी छ ?
ques_en: Do you have an outstanding debt?
highlights: Trouble ahead: 93% are already in some kind of debt

ques_ne: के तपाईंँको परिवारमा कसैलाई कोभिड-१९ लागेको छ/थियो?
ques_en: Have any one in your family ever been infected by COVID-19?
highlights: Avoided COVID-19 infection…

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ to को कारणले गर्दा तपाईंले निम्न मध्ये कुनै पनि मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रभावहरू भोग्नुभयो?
ques_en: Did you suffer any of the following psycho-social impact due to covid-19?
highlights: ...but couldn't avoid psycho-social impact, About 95% reported some sort of psycho-social impact

ques_ne: तपाईंं अथवा तपाईंँको परिवारको पर्यटन बाहेक वैकल्पिक आय श्रोत छ?
ques_en: Do you or your family have an alternative source of income other than tourism?
highlights: Alternative income source but more than 80% are dependent on tourism sector only.

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ को कारणले गर्दा के तपाईंंले निम्न मध्ये कुनै ऋण सम्बन्धित प्रभावहरू भोग्नु/गर्नु पर्यो?
ques_en: Which of the following loan related actions did you have to take due to the pandemic?
highlights: Burrowing Money: Most of them burrowed from friends or family, few did through financial institutions

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ को कारणले गर्दा के तपाईंंले निम्न मध्ये कुनै सम्पत्ति सम्बन्धित असर भोग्नु/गर्नु पर्यो?
ques_en: Which of the following assets related actions did you have to take due to the pandemic?
highlights: One in four persons have had to sell their assets

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ को कारणले गर्दा के तपाईंंले निम्न मध्ये कुनै पारिवारिक सेवाहरूमा असर भोग्नु/गर्नु पर्यो?
ques_en: Which of the following family services related actions did you have to take due to the pandemic?
highlights: Stopped health and education services of family members

ques_ne: के तपाईंँले कोभिड-१९ को खोप लगाउनुभएको छ ?
ques_en: Have you been vaccinated against Covid-19?
highlights: Nearly half of the respondents reported to be vaccinated against COVID-19

ques_ne: के तपाईंँले कोभिड-१९ सम्बन्धी स्वास्थ्य तथा सुरक्षाको तालिम प्राप्त गर्नुभएको छ ?
ques_en: Have you received any health and safety training related to Covid-19?
highlights: Health and safety training, More than 95% haven't receive any sort of health and saftey related training

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ले ल्याएको मानसिक तनावको लागि कुनै किसिमको स्वास्थ्य परामर्श सेवा लिनुभएको छ?
ques_en: Have you taken any kind of health counseling service for the mental stress brought by Covid-19?
highlights: Even if 95% reported some sorted of psycho-social impact, only 13% seeked for help

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ को बारेमा जानकारी पाउन निम्न मध्ये कुन-कुन स्रोतहरू प्रयोग गर्नुहुन्छ? (मुख्य तीनवटा छान्नुहोस्)
ques_en: Which of the following sources do you mainly use to get information about Covid-19? (Choose three main sources)
highlights: Getting informed about COVID-19, Social-Media on the top

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ ले पारेको असर कम गर्न तपाईंँलाई निम्न मध्ये कुन-कुन रोजगार सम्बन्धि सहयोगहरु उपयुक्त हुन्छन् ?
ques_en: Which of the following employment related support would help in reducing the effects of COVID-19 on you?
highlights: What kind of employment related support will be useful?

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ ले पारेको असर कम गर्न तपाईंँलाई निम्न मध्ये कुन-कुन आर्थिक सहयोगहरु उपयुक्त हुन्छन् ?
ques_en: Which of the following financial support would help in reducing the effects of COVID-19 on you?
highlights: What kind of financial support will be useful?

ques_ne: कोभिड-१९ ले तपाईंंको जिविकोपार्जनमा पारेको असर अझै कति समय सम्म रहला जस्तो छ ?
ques_en: For how much longer do you expect the effect of the pandemic on your livelihood to last?
highlights: Most of them expects impact on livelihood to last for at least more than 12 months

ques_ne: पर्यटन क्षेत्र सुचारु भएपश्चात आफ्नो रोजगार पहिलेको जस्तो अवस्थामा पुर्याउन कति समय लाग्ला?
ques_en: How long will it take for your employment to return to normal after the tourism sector is up and running again? Provide your best estimate.
highlights: Employment will take time to return to normal even after tourism sector is up and running

ques_ne: आउँदो ६ महिना सम्म यही परिस्थिति रहेमा निम्नमध्ये कुन-कुन अवस्था तपाईंंले भोग्नु पर्ने हुन्छ?
ques_en: If the current situation continues for the next 6 months, which of the following difficulties will you face?
highlights: Expected difficulties in the next six months

ques_ne: तपाईंं संलग्न रहेको पर्यटन क्षेत्रको पुन:उत्थानको निम्ति प्रमुख चुनौतीहरू के-के छन् ?
ques_en: What are the major challenges for the revival of the tourism sub-sector you are involved in?
highlights: Biggest challenges of Nepali tourism: what do the workers think?

ques_ne: सन् २०१९ को तुलनामा सन् २०२१ मा तपाईंंको परिवारको आय कति रहने अनुमान छ?
ques_en: What is the estimated income of your family in 2021 compared to 2019?
highlights: More than 60% estimated their income to be zero in 2021

ques_ne: लिङ्ग
ques_en: Gender

ques_ne: उमेर
ques_en: Age

ques_ne: पूरा गरेको शैक्षिक तह
ques_en: Completed educational level

ques_ne: तपाईंँ पर्यटन क्षेत्रमा काम गर्नुभएको कति समय भयो?
ques_en: How long have you been working in the tourism sector?
